akn:section.akn:heading: Transition to private commercial or other sources of credit

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general In making or insuring a farm loan under subchapter I or II, the Secretary shall establish a plan and promulgate regulations (including performance criteria) that promote the goal of transitioning borrowers to private commercial credit and other sources of credit in the shortest period of time practicable.
(b) Coordination In carrying out this section, the Secretary shall integrate and coordinate the transition policy described in subsection (a) with—
